body.name: Fisher-Price Little People Big Yellow Bus, musical push and pull toy with Smart Stages for toddlers and preschool kids
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 9 hrs 9 mins
features: The iconic Little People school bus gets super-sized with a pull-handle that stores underneath
Press the Discovery Buttons for music, sounds, lights and Smart Stages learning content
Manually open the door, flip out the stop sign, and open the wheelchair ramp
Bring your friends! Bus comes with 4 figures and features space for up to 12 (Additional figures sold separately.)
For toddlers and preschool kids ages 1-5 years
body.description: To the park, the museum, or the moons of Jupiter, toddlers can embark on all sorts of exciting field trips with the Little People Big Yellow School Bus. This super-sized, push-along bus comes with 4 Little People character figures, a pull handle, and realistic features like an opening door, stop sign and wheelchair ramp. As kids roll from one adventure to the next, the bus’s playful songs, sounds, lights and phrases help teach the alphabet, counting, colors and more through three Smart Stages levels that grow along with your child. And with space to seat up to 12 figures, your little explorer can bring all their Little People friends along for the ride! (Additional figures sold separately.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smilestones: Bringing a smile to milestones At Fisher-Price, we know play and development go hand in hand. From bright colors & textures to engage their senses, to activities that get them sitting up & crawling, and interactive friends that introduce first words & spark imaginations, Fisher-Price toys help make reaching those important milestones (and everything in between) so much fun.

Honk-honk! Here comes the bus Toddlers can head out on exciting learning adventures with their Little People friends aboard the Big Yellow School Bus. Sit and push or walk and pull the vehicle along to roll from one destination to the next. Next stop: School!

Features Press the buttons for lights and 40+ songs, sounds, tunes and phrases. Door opens for easy loading and unloading. All students are welcome on the bus. Roll from one adventure to the next with up to 12 Little People friends! (Additional figures sold separately.)

What a wonderful little world Hay is for horses – but so are hugs. That’s just one of the little life lessons that toddlers learn when they play with their Little People friends. By creating kid-sized versions of real-life experiences, Fisher-Price Little People toys bring a whole world of adventures to the palms of their teeny hands. Content changes with Smart Stages technology Level 1 – Discover: Little bus riders are introduced to the alphabet, counting, shapes and more. Level 2 – Experience: Fun phrases and songs help kids prepare to ride a real school bus. Level 3 – Imagine: Sounds and instrumental music inspire kids to create their own adventures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The build quality of toy bus is great. The little one enjoys pulling the bus back and forth around the house. Easy to clean and stickers have not please so far. The music is not too loud. Great looking toy and easy to use. Would recommend changing the batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big , fun to play with, affordable
reviews.reviewText: My children love playing with this bus and the Little People toys . The bus has buttons that make different noises . It resembles a real school bus and even has wheel chair accessibility . It’s so realistic ! It’s also very roomy / spacious ! The handle adds to the fun making it easier to push/pull across the room for a fun bus ride ! It’s so much fun and so cute ! I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy yet light weight
reviews.reviewText: My19 month old grandson loves this bus! It’s sturdy enough to lean on and push. Yet light enough for him to repeatedly pick it up and place on a table. Also like that you can add more little people!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for toddler!
reviews.reviewText: My 4 year old is obsessed with this school bus. The quality is great and it keeps him entertained for hours!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quickly Arrived this time, a facinating fun Schoolbus!!
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: I bought it again when had no arrival at first at my grandsons house in TX -but the SPANISH version of the schoolbus arrived! We don’t need another language yet at one years old. I Re Ordered again on this webpage, the ENGLISH schoolbus arrived very quickly at my granddons house. He and his big sister absolutely LOVE it! Thank you very much! I love the quality of Fisher Price toys. I bought the Schoolbus plus extra Little People for it through Fisher Price Store. Got it for my grandson’s birthday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a gift for my 2 year old son. He absolutely loves it. He pulls it around everywhere. The little people toys are also so cute and fun. He plays with it everyday without fail. It is very strong and holds up well to daily play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bus is huge. My two year old is into school buses for some reason and this was the perfect item for him. It has the easy pull handle for him to take it along with him easily when playing. The buttons are easy for him to press and he loves the sounds. This toy is a huge hit and one of the favorites when he has his cousins and friends over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 1 year old grandson loves this toy
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my year old grandson for his birthday. He plays with it all the time. Very sturdy and has different song settings.

I didnt realize this toy bus is gonna be this huge, and my toddler loves it! He even rides on it and I push it around his play area. The little people characters are great addition and you can use other little people characters to place in the bus for more passengers. My baby is learning how to pull the bus with the pull handle (folded underneath the bus) and enjoy the different songs/ sounds when pushing the buttons. It’s very interactive.
Le encanto a mi bebe, es mas grande de lo que esperaba para un no entre 3 y 4 años lo recomiendo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Granddaughter is 15 months and spends ages putting the little people in and out of the bus. She loves it .
love the quality and the inclusiveness. purchased for a friends little boy (2yo) and he loves it
Pour un cadeau d'anniversaire d'un enfant de 2 ans il adore
